Package org.texgen.textures.composite

Textures used to compose multiple textures together based on alpha values or even based on a ChannelSignal value.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
MergedTexture Takes two textures, a background and an overlay and merges them based on the alpha value of the overlay
MultiMergeTexture Takes a list of textures and merges them down to one color based on transparency and the color of the textures.
SignalMixer Takes two input textures (A and B) and merges them based on the input from a channel source.
TextureMixer Takes a list of textures and mixes them equally

count = number of textures
result = color(0,0,0,0);

for each texture : result = result + texture.getColor(u,v)
result.scale(1/count);
 

Package org.texgen.textures.composite Description

Textures used to compose multiple textures together based on alpha values or even based on a ChannelSignal value.
